website_summaries.verdict: Unique design and extra wide seat make these chairs a perfect option for extra seating. Advertises a huge load capacity, but practical use shows otherwise.
pros: Plastic mesh back and seat provide excellent ventilation
Extra wide seat is comfortable for users of any size
cons: When folded, they don't fit together or stack as well as some other models
The wide seat is great but the plastic mesh doesn't hold the 1,000 pound capacity advertised

customer_reviews.title: Two of the seats broke in less than a year w/only occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I initially LOVED these chairs - cute and light and super comfortable - but now, less than one year of using them only occasionally, TWO of the seats have broken. No one in my family weighs over 145 pounds and we stored them indoors, so heat did not degrade the material. Picture attached. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Last 2 years before CHAIR SNAPPED.
customer_reviews.text: They cannot hold anywhere near 1,000 pounds. I purchased a four pack via amazon in may 2015 for my brother whom is 320 pounds. Through normal use today chair just snapped. Luckily he managed to sustained scratches in his rear and sore back. The scratches did break skin however. Again the chair did last about 2 years of occasional use. He did say he was sitting more towards mid end of seat. I just don't understand how these are are rated for 1,000 pounds. They also say they have a 5 year warranty. Let's see how this plays out. I have pics to prove incident.
customer_reviews.author: SELF-AWARE

customer_reviews.title: Chairs have split
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when we received these chairs, since they appeared to be exactly what we wanted—light-weight, very comfortable, extra chairs when needed. My husband is 200 lbs and I am 145 lbs. Three chairs have split in the middle of the seat. At no time has anyone over 200 lbs used the chairs. I am now very disappointed. I give them one star because we had used them for three years before the first one split.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaneroo

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these originally in 2012/2013 and they are seriously great. But I recently purchased 8 more and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these originally in 2012/2013 and they are seriously great. But I recently purchased 8 more and the material is horrible, we've had 4 of them have had legs bend and we can no longer use. These are getting the same use as the original 8, but are basically falling apart as they seemed to be using cheaper material since they originally came out.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne T. Glen

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these chairs in February of 2015 because it stated ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these chairs in February of 2015 because it stated the chair holds 1,000 lbs and it has a 10 year warranty. I took them out of the box in the Summer because of the various guests and now the seat to each chair is sagging near the foot rest. If you sit in the chair for any length of time now, your knees will be in serious pain. I have been unable to reach the manufacturer of the Flex One Folding Chair. Amazon says they are unable to assist me with this issue because the return policy has passed. Incidentally, no one came close to meeting the weight restriction on these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who writes a review for a folding chair? Well...
customer_reviews.text: In the process of moving, I was in need of some foldable, durable, lightweight chairs to use in the short-term, and hopefully have for storage in the long-term when unexpected guests need a place to sit. I read the reviews and thought people were awfully excited about this set. I mean, c'mon. It's a set of FOLDING CHAIRS. But it turns out, there's a reason to be excited. These chairs are foldable, relatively lightweight (compared with metal versions), durable, Made in the USA (USA! USA! USA!), and-- most importantly-- they are actually comfortable. Seriously. They are comfortable. They are also pretty stylish for what they are. Happy sitting. Or happy folding.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: How to unfold these wonderful chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these sturdy comfortable chairs but they are very stiff to unfold. My son accidentally broke one trying to unfold it. Recommendation - don't grab the center of the seat to unfold your new chair, instead pull gently on one seat corner until it opens a little and then pull on the other seat corner until it gives a little and at a certain point the entire chair seat will open easily. I suspect as the chairs are used it becomes easier to open them, but mine are still new. The third-party vendor was wonderful and gave me a postage paid label to return the broken chair and then sent a replacement. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: practical shopper

customer_reviews.title: Time Has Not Been So Kind
customer_reviews.text: Purchased set of 4 in November 2013, mainly for extra seating for guests on holidays and other special events. Was initially thrilled with the comfort level and low cost, but alas time has changed my impressions. Having lightly used over last 2 years, I'd have expected at least 5 years use out of these if not more. No - 3 of the 4 seats have split making them unusable and the 4th chair is showing signs of the same. Despite all the great reviews on here, I'd like to know if others have similar experiences over time. I did get a $25 credit when first chair went bad but gave up on the others.
customer_reviews.author: cue ball

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are bigger than I expected (a good thing in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are bigger than I expected (a good thing in my opinion). They are a little bit bigger than all our other folding chairs. They are extremely comfortable to sit in. All the guests who sit in them ask where we got them and comment on how comfortable they are. My teenage son noticed the seat flexes a lot when he stands on them -- the flexible plastic is a big part of the comfort. I suggested he get a ladder and not stand on my favorite folding chairs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pope

customer_reviews.title: It says in the product description, " Constructed in ...
customer_reviews.text: It says in the product description, " Constructed in the USA from 18-gauge cold-rolled steel and impact resistant polypropylene, Flex one is extremely durable and stands up to the rigors of commercial use. I hope the later claims are more accurate than the first. These chairs appear not to be made in the US. It says no where on them that they are. What it does say, two stickers on each chair, is that these chairs are made in Malaysia.
customer_reviews.author: Mray137

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs! I'm heavy and wider across the butt that I should be, but these chairs are wide enough that they're comfortable for hours. They feel very sturdy, don't wiggle even side to side, and the vinyl/plastic mesh is just flexible enough to prevent that 'I sat too long" pain. They're not heavy for all their solid construction and will get lots of use when we visit our kids - we can bring along our own chairs. I was also very happy to see they're made in the USA; I support American manufacture whenever I can in hopes that companies will keep jobs here.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L

customer_reviews.title: AWARD: Most Comfortable Folding Chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs. This is quite likely the most comfortable folding chair you will ever sit on - the seat and back flex, meaning the chair will form into a comfortable shape for your body. We had a set (which has lasted for many years, still in great shape) and recently purchased additional chairs for the rest of the outdoor areas at our place. Thankfully we found a match on Amazon. It's surprising to get so many compliments on what is otherwise a very simple, utilitarian folding chair. Fantastic product. Lasts a long time. Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Two chairs broken after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of light use two of them were already broken, and no one in the family weighs over 180 pounds. Now we'll see if there's a way to get ahold of the customer service for warranty... Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what they would be like since they are plastic, but they are great. They bounce a little when you fist sit on them, giving the impression that they aren't sturdy, but they are very strong. The seats seem wider than many other folding chairs, and they are high enough to sit at our dining table. They are surprisingly comfortable, maybe because they do have some give, unlike most folding chairs. They are super light weight, and easy to move around. I highly recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M PDX

customer_reviews.title: DUPED: MADE IN MALAYSIA NOT USA
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one set of four that were MADE IN THE USA and liked them. I liked them a lot and was so excited that they were made in the USA so I ordered five more sets. To my disappointment, my second order of the same chairs were MADE IN MALAYSIA. They were advertised to be made in the USA when I ordered them both times and the second order was not made in the USA. There was a blatant switch. These were not the chairs that I expected or ordered. I was duped and am not happy. Not cool Amazon! The description has now changed changed to say made in Malaysia.
customer_reviews.author: Bookkeeper

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I rated overall a 4, here is why. Not easy to fold. They fold good, and while it isn't hard, it does take some muscle, my dear aged aunt would have a very difficult time. sturdiness: what I noticed when a guest was seated was that he tended to 'lean' forward. so after the party I tried it and noticed the same thing. The front of the chair is not as high as it should be It tends to lean. This I do not like. Comfort: except for the way the seat dips forward it overall is comfortable and a good wide cool seat.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic but are very comfortable. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these chairs thinking I was getting the mesh ones. They are plastic but are very comfortable. However, a large man sat in one the first day I had them and broke some of the plastic mesh on the bottom. He was not 1000 pounds! He probably was 250 pounds though.
customer_reviews.author: mattie

customer_reviews.title: Consider metal instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Two of my chairs broke injuring the people sitting on them. The seat actually cracked. I tried to reach the manufacturer for warranty services. A ticket was created, and then no communication was had. Perhaps metal would have been a better choice after all. Pro: no arm, folding chairs that are reasonably comfortable and exceptionally durable. I’m very impressed. Con: the narrow feet will still push into softer ground and this can imbalance the chair causing damage. I put a bigger foot on the legs and that’s made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: As many others have noted, these chairs break! They seem fine at first. They are comfortable to sit on. After a few months the plastic becomes so weak that you can put your hand right through the mesh! See photos. We bought 40 of them and are now replacing them all. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for a folding chair, but despite only light use, seat cracked in a few years. The company ignored my request to honor the promised 12-year warranty
customer_reviews.author: T. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Have gotten them before. Had 2 issues: they had stickers one them that don't really come off and so I have to put time in not to make them tacky. The other was one was not put together correctly and had to be changed around to open, but I think that was a fluke. Still awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: -TA

customer_reviews.title: Most-comfortable folding chairs available: It's True
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable chairs, light weight. Great price. These get reviewed repeatedly on many websites as being the most comfortable folding chairs, out of all brands available. Those reviews are correct. You won't go wrong with these chairs. (Just worried that they might get stolen when they are outside, since they are so comfortable.)
customer_reviews.author: Niles508

customer_reviews.title: waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: What part holds the capacity that it claims? The rubber webbing stretches out in the seat within minutes leaving your derriere pinched into a frame making it near impossible to up from. Hate them. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Friend

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs.... Comfortableand light weight. I dislike how cold metal folding chairs feel. These are great and surprisingly nice to sit in for long periods of time because they give a little so they aren't hard.. A bit expensive but hopefully they will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfortable, easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: We used these to replace some old metal folding chairs. They are super comfortable, easy to move around, and people that have come to our home have commented on their amazing comfort (we hold a weekly choir practice in our music room). They are super sturdy but have a nice give in them - almost enough to make it feel padded. They also have a little bit wider and deeper seat, especially nice for larger men, giving everybody a little more space (elbow room) even when put right next to each other. They store nicely, a little bit bigger than our old metal ones, but not much. They are significantly smaller than the Lifetime ones we almost purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable folding chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs have worked perfectly for extra company in the living room or on the balcony. Also super comfortable like a normal size chair... Everyone that comes over has complemented these chairs. Great find/good price. Also, I'm a plus size girl, and 2.5 years later these chairs have still held up and look good. Mind you I I was raised to take care of my things, and that might make a difference. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by 10 year warrantee
customer_reviews.text: Our initial reaction was the chairs are great. Comfortable, sturdy and easy to fold. But within a few months of regular use, the mesh on the seats started to separate. I advised the vendor of the issue and inquired about the warrantee. They never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R Thurston

customer_reviews.title: seats crack and break
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 of these chairs of the 8 6 are broken. I have not abused them, I am not heavy, they are always inside. I am sad because they were comfortable initially but just don't last.
customer_reviews.author: m jage

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Extra Chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic fold away chairs. Very comfortable and can fit some very large mammals in comfort and safety. I do not know about the 1000 pounds they claim it can hold, but I know it can hold well over 200 pounds. Also, very cool on a scorching summer's day, as it is not all metal to burn your skin off. Add to that, it says it is made in the US so it is all good. I ended up purchasing a SECOND four pack they are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: AVengefulGhostMadeFlesh

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Folding chairs are usually one of the most annoying things to deal with: They are flimsy, and not very comfortable, but you really need them at times. These, as you can tell from the star rating, are different. First, they are sturdy. When you sit it one, you don't feel like you are going to break it. Second, the mesh gives, so they are comfortable. Third, they are wider than the usual folding chair, which increases the comfort. I really appreciate having these for those occasional big family dinners and then being able to store them away until the next time we need them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Teen approved
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our playroom. Once a week my teens host a LAN party for a bunch of their friends. I did not want to have tables and chairs set up permanently in our playroom, so I went for these chairs and some trestle tables. My kids tell me that these are the most comfortable folding chairs they've ever sat on. They love them so much that they wanted to use them permanently at our kitchen table (I vetoed this, but did agree that these chairs are very comfortable). They are also very light, so that makes it easy for the kids to move them into the attic and take them out again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great/uncomfortable support
customer_reviews.text: Base is not wide enough as you sink into the chair, you're not held up comfortably away from the support bars. It's tough to get overly comfortable because of this.. Not as happy as I thought I would be. I'm a 200 pound guy, and figured these would be fine for me. Will look for a better brand next time..
customer_reviews.author: GeoF4

customer_reviews.title: The "gray" IS shiny, metalic
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews cover how awesome these chairs are. I just wanted to confirm that on the "gray" version the metal IS a shiny metallic color as it appears to be in the picture. Metallic is what I was wanting, but they described it as "gray" and sometimes a picture can be misleading so I was hoping the photo was giving an accurate representation. It was. So, If you want the metal parts to have a light, shiny metallic look, then don't let the word "gray" throw you off. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great - solid, portable, and more comfortable than a lot of non-portable chairs. We use them indoor and outdoor and they still stand up like new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tube

customer_reviews.title: Heavy chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs looked like they would be perfect around our table. However, I am sending them back. They are sturdy but heavy for me to lift and fold. And they don’t fold up tightly like folding chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra L Smart

customer_reviews.title: Apparently a comfortable folding chair is not an oxymoron
customer_reviews.text: Strangely, after buying these chairs to supplement the four normal patio chairs on our deck, I've started wanting to find excuses to sit on these instead. They're ridiculously sturdy, flexible, and just downright pleasant to sit on. For the price, I think they're a real bargain. If you're thinking of using these day in and day out, that sounds fine. They feel like they'll last a long, long time, and they're more attractive than a lot of normal chairs. If you have been scouring the internet for a really awesome folding chair, consider it found.
customer_reviews.author: pinguino

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Wide, Strong, Good Looking Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable folding chairs ever. I wanted breathable, padded chairs that would be easy to clean and easy to store. These fit the bill. The mesh makes them super comfy like they're padded. And BONUS - the chairs are really wide so they don't push your shoulders forward like other chairs or make you feel cramped when setup for an audience. I drove around to several different HomeDepots trying to get 30 chairs, after the third place, I gave up and ordered from Amazon. So easy, and came right to my house in perfect condition - not dusty like the HD chairs (don't get me wrong, I love HD, but c'mon, the dust!).
customer_reviews.author: Destination Fit

customer_reviews.title: Good, lightweight foldable chairs
customer_reviews.text: Our church bought these chairs to replace our old metal folding chairs. What an improvement! They were so comfortable that we purchased a set of four for our daughter and her husband. They are lightweight, durable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got these in white, and they are: --Light --Look nice! --comfortable -easy to clean Not much more to say, happy with this purchase for the above reasons. I do agree with the reviewers who say this is not for big people, if you weigh a lot more than say 200 pounds I am not sure it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a party because we needed a few more chairs. They are the most comfortable folding chairs I have ever sat in, and many guests made the same comment. I thought the seats would be hard because they were not padded, but there was enough give to the plastic seats that they were quite comfortable to sit in for hours. I am very glad we got these--they will be the first chairs we pull out when we need extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H-S

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We put out these chairs for extra guests around the dining room table for the holidays. A couple days later, I noticed that when there were 4 or less people at the table, they we only sitting in these folding chairs, rather than the regular dining chairs. It turns out that everyone thought they were much more comfortable and pleasant to sit in. I think that's pretty high praise for folding chairs. They also stack up pretty thin for storage. Overall, these are great chairs!
customer_reviews.author: pveman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs got lots of compliments from friends! Very comfortable. They store close together and are very lightweight. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ccb1107

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chair
customer_reviews.text: We love the chairs. Look nice, strong and durable. Our only complaint is that their is a decal placed on every chair that is visible and difficult to remove. You then must use goof off to remove the glue resin. This is a time consuming process when purchasing a large quantity and would be easy to rectify.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spare chairs. When they arrive, check the color..
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are great. Really comfortable and light. Easy to storage. However, the only advise I would give that as soon as they arrive check that they are the color ordered. I ordered white and got black ones. Unfortunately, I checked after the return period was over. Either way we are keeping them. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect to have on hand for when family or others come and we need extra seating. they are light, easy to handle and sturdy. They arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs! Well built, great price and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased a set of 4 of these chairs a few years ago. We use them for card games & extra seating when guests come over. I purchased 4 more I like them so much. For a folding low price point chair, these chairs are well built and I feel they are very comfortable for a folding chair. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Good value, reasonable comfort, and so far has been durable. The ventilation on the back of the chair is much appreciate on hot and humid days. There is enough flex to the chair that it is reasonable comfortable. Don't know how it could get better than this for a plastic chair.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable - fold up thin
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. We have a small apartment and they fold up very thin and tight together to fit nicely in the closet. My only complaint would be that when they were packaged the box they were shipped in was closed with a big heavy duty stapler and the staple made a pretty decent gouge in the top of one of the chairs. Since we're only going to use the chairs occasionally I didn't want to deal with the hassle of returning it, but it's definitely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Zsoka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs. Ordered 4 more.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chairs. Weather proof..everything proof, comfortable because they stretch slightly and are not rigid, but the outlying frame is. Love them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ryantlinder6

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable chairs for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I used them for my board game room, great comfortable chairs for a great price! If you have some much larger guests tho, I would recommend a cushion as the sides of the chair can dig into their legs. but for most people, this chair is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable folding chair I've used
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable folding chair I've used, at least until the MityLite mesh version which is divine but that's neither here nor there. They are high quality, great build quality, seems like they will last, nice looking, and fold up super thin.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gould

customer_reviews.title: Flex One folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are rated to hold 1,000 lbs and I believe it. They are solidly built and sturdy. The contoured plastic seat and back are very comfortable. My only complaint is that they are a little hard to open. Perhaps a little lubricant will fix that. I like that the chairs are made in the USA. I am tired of having to buy junk from China. They are a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shorian

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, seats wider than other folding chairs. Attractive black mesh seats and back. Fold and stack nicely. Seem to be sturdy. Have only had for a couple of weeks, so don't know about durability. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Folding chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These folding chairs are very nice for the money. I weigh about 290 pounds and they support me just fine. The latice like structure of the seat and back allows a little air circulation and also provides a little 'give' when sitting in them. I like these much better than the metal seats or even the slightly padded fiberboard seats. I find I can sit in these longer with less discomfort than any of the other folding chairs I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for extra seating. Can't beat the price. Light but sturdy design. Very comfortable, easy to store. Would highly recommend. My guests commented on the design and comfort. Arrived on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these chairs I have purchased because I love how comfortable they are! Very sturdy, portable and easy to clean. An added bonus is our cat doesn't like to sit on them, as he sits on everything else and won't move.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable folding chair!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are truly nice, very comfortable and sturdy. When the whole family comes together we set up a banquet table and use these chairs. Good quality at a fair price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Honeysuckle Queen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We had family come over for the holidays and were in need of some extra seating. I looked at metal folding chairs but they all seemed cheap, were heavy and were still quite expensive. I bought these solely on the recommendations on Amazon and I'm glad I did! I paid about $25 a chair and it was worth every penny. They are very comfortable, lightweight, extra-wide and well built. Everyone commented on how comfortable they were and asked me where I got them. If you need chairs... get these!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: bought 24 of these these for our meeting facility. I am 280 lds. These mity-lite chairs boast a 400 pound capacity. I pulled one out when the boxes arrived folded it open and jump up and down on it several times. The chair as a natural flex to it for comfort, but did not bend or break. The powder coat finish should hold up for many years under normal use. Light, sturdy, comforatable and easy to store! What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Bam Bam

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression: Impressive build quality (but haven't used yet).  Look for future edit.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace some elderly folding chairs ... a set from the 60's, and a set from the '80s. They still were functional but was looking for what the best product looked like today. A pretty thorough review suggested these were the best ... we'll see! Look for future edit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe V

customer_reviews.title: oddly short. I know other people said the same ...
customer_reviews.text: oddly short. I know other people said the same but it is actually too short for kids to use. On the other hand, our tall friends prefer them.
customer_reviews.author: Katymac

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Despite comments that it's cheaper at Wal Mart or Sam's Club, that either requires actually going to the store to pick it up or if you have it delivered, you pay for shipping. I priced this out prior to purchasing on Amazon and these chairs were purchased 12/2013. The savings via Wal Mart or Sam's Club was about $10. Since I have Prime, I didn't pay for shipping and had other items like a folding table. Very convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these chairs since 2014. Very good and sturdy chairs. I keep one in my truck bed just in case i need a chair when I travel away from home. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are super comfy, sturdy, and well priced. We ordered 4 for Thanksgiving overflow and they were the hot subject of the day! I'll be ordering 4 more for next year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying more of these to use in my class room I am designing in my new shop. These are very comfortable for folding chairs and not hard like some.
customer_reviews.author: SpaDiva25

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable folding chairs. Light weight, very sturdy and the contours are comfortable. Not like sitting in the flat steel chairs where after 5 minutes you have to get up and walk off the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in a folding chair
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are lightweight, have a wider than usual seat making them comfortable for larger persons, and the seat 'gives' so they are very comfortable. They fold into a very slim profile, and fit one up against the other, so they take less storage space than my old metal chairs. As you set aside storage space, remember they are taller and wider than the average metal folding chair. I live in an apartment, so space is at a premium. But when I pull out these chairs I know everyone will be comfortable enough to linger at the table.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to have as extra chairs for game nights or parties. While I didn't sit in them myself for an extended period of time, I was told by my guests that they were very comfortable, especially for being plastic occasional chairs. The only negative I heard was that they were a bit cold because they allowed the air to circulate with all the cut outs in the seat and back. Personally, I don't think that would be a bad thing, in fact that would probably be pretty awesome come summer time!
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Folds like an accordion, but not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy, but these definitely didn't hold up. 1000 pound limit - which, I'm nowhere near that, is a joke. The seat space is ok, but not quite wide enough. Those considering these chairs with a wide tuchus should reconsider. It doesn't hurt if you have a narrow tail, but the rails for the seat will wear on you quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great folding chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very solid and comfortable for folding chairs. I brought them for outdoor seating at block parties, but they were so nice that my son took one to college to use as a desk chair temporarily, but has not wanted another one since.
customer_reviews.author: Marshamellow

customer_reviews.title: Flex Folding Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packs of these for the holidays, and they not only look nicer then most folding chairs but they are super comfortable. I sit on one of these quite often and I will admit I was against the price at first but now I know they are well worth the money. These chairs are very comfortable for folding chairs. If your thinking about getting some a little cheaper.. DON'T.. Spend a little extra money and get something 10 times the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chairs...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. I've been looking for a better folding chair than the typical metal w/pad chairs that all the big box stores sell for quite awhile. Finally, I found these... Comfortable, breathable, light, well built, and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Bret Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly comfortable folding chairs. We have purchased several sets as gifts for other friends/family members because everyone is so impressed with them. We do not leave them outside in the elements though, as we are not sure if the hardware will rust or not.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaosophie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chairs. Light weight, use them all the time on my patio and inside my home. So comfy, they have some flex in seat and back (and fit perfectly to your tush). Just went to visit my son in DC and brought these for extra seating in their apartment. Chairs ended up staying in DC and I bought another set for home. Would make an great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Xander

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable chair. I like how it lets the air through. Not sure it's a comfortable as a well padded chair but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Muzic Man

customer_reviews.title: Yup, best folding chair
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviewers have said, this really is the best folding chair ever. Comfortable, easy to clean, light weight, ventilated (no more sweaty butt in summer), folds slim, so takes up little space when stored, and slightly wider to accomodate some of my slightly wider friends. Have bought 20 of these for our church group, and will be buying another 8 or more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: I needed folding chairs for a card table, and these chairs are everything that I was looking for. As with other folding chairs, these fold up to a nice small storage space. When deployed, they seem sturdy, well made, and somewhat comfortable. No, you are not sitting on a feather pillow, but not a brick either. They are comfortable enough to sit in for a couple of hours. They are fairly lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate comfort for your bum
customer_reviews.text: I only use these when guests come over, but they’re even more comfortable than my wood kitchen chairs. A little expensive compared to other options, but I definitely feel I got my money’s worth with these. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are super comfortable! They are good on your back and can be used for multiple hours without being uncomfortable. They look very good in the white color and match my white table that I use when I have extra people over to the house. They are built very well and can be transported easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A great folding chair
customer_reviews.text: Found out about them on Wirecutter. They are light, comfortable, durable, and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Skilla

customer_reviews.title: Wide, comfortable folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are the widest, most comfortable folding chairs I have ever used. I really like them and their price is not too much more than the regular, metal junk chairs you generally see. They are a bit (maybe 2") wider than normal, but that makes a big difference. They are also very flexible plastic mesh that makes them much more comfortable to sit in for an extended period of time. They come in a big box fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: No more metal chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 8 of these for a party and received several positive comments from my guest. The chairs are very comfortable as they have some "give" to the seats, and your butt doesn't get sore after just a few minutes sitting in them. They are light, easy to store, simple to clean, and will never rust out. If they will last at least 2 years, then the economics will work out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Strawther

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this chairs during the holidays for our tiny apartment, just to have chairs for guests. They turned out so comfortable that I end up sitting on them instead of the chairs i have with a cushion. That does not say much about the cushion :). In any case, i would recommend these as back up or temporary chairs in you have not found your perfect set yet but need something to sit on and not be in pain. And the best part, there was no assembly needed!
customer_reviews.author: Elena kaye

customer_reviews.title: More Comfortable than it looks
customer_reviews.text: These chairs don't look like much, but they're infinitely more comfortable than your standard metal folding chair. The plastic mesh area keeps you cool and has enough give to make these comfortable chairs to sit in for much longer than a flat metal chair. Worth the extra money if you need extra seating for parties or anything (and you care about the chairs your guests sit in hah).
customer_reviews.author: J.Lo

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice folding chairs. Better quality than I imagined they would be! Perfect for my holiday get together.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G.

customer_reviews.title: A good chair for slightly larger butts.
customer_reviews.text: This product is how things should be made. The only limitation I can see is that it should not be left outdoors; it will rust. But it is sturdy. It is comfortable. It is light. And it is an overall excellent value. The fact that it is wider than most folding chairs, makes it more comfortable for your larger size adults. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C. Felton

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my new chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new chairs. I still cannot believe how lightweight and comfortable they are. I will be ordering another set in the very near future. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a well designed, and extremely comfortable chair at an unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.author: ebby gyrl

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are comfortable, and we're very pleased with them so far. We purchased these for outdoor use. Given the deign, they should hold up. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the chairs. They are prettier than the samsonite folding chairs. Would be perfect for wedding guests. They are lightweight so I can easily carry two at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs about six month ago, and got to use them last week. The chairs were fine for my guest, and they complimented me on them. I know the chairs are strong because I'm 6'5" and weigh 350lbs, the chairs didn't feel wobbly, and held my weight just fine. They are also bigger than most folding chairs, and are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lhh Az

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of dinner guests over and sometimes need extra chairs and a fold up table to add to our dining room table. Many of our guests have commented how comfortable these chairs are. They are bigger than regular folding chairs and have a bit of give to them. I also like how the chair is designed to dry easily if caught in the rain and it also makes them not any heavier than my regular folding chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are surprisingly very sturdy, good size and very confortablr.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Sampelayo

customer_reviews.title: Good bye, old metal (or padded) "gym" chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs resemble the old "gym" chairs like we all sat in at school, but when you sit in these you can really tell the difference! They are very comfortable and are very strong and sturdy...
customer_reviews.author: D. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, very sturdy, exactly as described and praised by other reviewers. Found the same chairs, individually priced (same price for 4 though) at a local big box hardware store, but Amazon delivered :) Will buy again if the need arises for more chairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. May

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Comfort and Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs as extra seating for my customers. They are very comfortable with lots of give as well as very sturdy. Classy for folding chairs and can fit into almost any decor. I plan on buying a few more!!
customer_reviews.author: Let's Create

customer_reviews.title: We ordered these chairs for our school, more than ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these chairs for our school, more than 20 of them broke the first time they were used!
customer_reviews.author: LHS

customer_reviews.title: Best folding chairs you can buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are very comfortable as they have a give to them that lets them almost form to you. Yet are strong enough to hold 1000 ponds. I had a 600 pound man sit in one and he said it was very comfortable for him and obviously did not break. I also have had people who are skinny and they have said it was the most comfortable folding chair they have sat in too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dotlich

customer_reviews.title: It is not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: It is not sturdy at all. I used it about 1 year and its plastic wires started to be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ji K.

customer_reviews.title: We use these every week as a church and they are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs! I am a part of a church that has used these chairs every week for the past two years and they have been great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Sarian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for banquet to back yard! And, they are heavy duty for weight. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nadirah Shakir

product_meta.title: Flex One Folding Chair, Black/Silver, 4-Pack
product_meta.description: Color:Black / SilverThe Flex one from Mity-Lite sets the standard for comfort in a folding chair at an economical price. Manfactured in Malaysia from 18-gauge cold-rolled steel and impact resistant polypropylene, Flex one is extremely durable and stands up to the rigors of commercial use. Utilizing a unique patterned plastic which allows its seat and backrest to flex to the contours of each individual, Flex one minimizes pressure points and provides unbelievable comfort. Experience excellent ergonomics at an economical price
